posts.post_content:
Slightly rounded corneres, some damage to the finish on the left side of the card limited to the frame, flip is a little cocked. This card was offered on ebay and the winning bidder never paid (after 5 emails to him and several promises from him) and will be offered here for 3 days at the "sold for" ebay price before I offer it to the second high ebay bidder at his bid. NO PMs, emails will be addressed in the order received [url]Snoopy525@Embarqmail.com[/url] There are 5 recorded PSA 4 sales on VCP with the latest and highest being $587.50, the lowest is $372. This one is being offered for $255, $5 priority mail shipping in a box. SOLD
